channel.desc: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes.

channel.desc: Nore heads to Te-Oneroa-a-T?h? with his uncle Simon Brown, hoping to net some fat kanae and catch t?mure. The Tangaroa-?-roto maramataka phase is usually a great fishing day, so hopes are high. (R).

channel.desc: Join the CoComelon family in a world that centres on the everyday experiences of young children through toe-tapping music. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to Te Rotorua-nui-a-Kahumatamomoe to uncover the landmarks connected to the ancient love story of Hinemoa and Tut?nekai. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: Follow our cute characters as they enter the magical alphabet forest where our talking Papa R?kau and talking pond K?k? live. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: Kura is furious that they have lost the godstick again and tries her best to stop her sister and Josh from making a deal with Hikuroa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kia Mau
channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haka Life Wharekura
channel.desc: Follow reigning champions, Te Wharekura o Hoani Waititi Marae, as they compete against other kura tuarua at Ng? Kapa Haka Kura Tuarua o Aotearoa 2024 in Whakat?. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pukuhohe
channel.desc: Game show testing the M?ori language skills of two teams. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haka Regionals 2024
channel.desc: Highlights from the Haka Regionals 2024. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Ring Inz
channel.desc: Once Were Warriors has a big impact on Lifebuoy. Nanny Fanny tries her best to take over where Teeps left off and Tdub has a terrifying dream. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rage Against The Rangatahi 2
channel.desc: Growing Pains - Growth spurts and hair down there. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Only In Aotearoa
channel.desc: Short and sharp comedy skits from a M?ori perspective. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Don't Even
channel.desc: NEW: Violet and Harley's friendship is tested after hijinks with Cousin Cheryl and Mickey uncover startling news.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kair?kau
channel.desc: A grief stricken Te Ramaapakura ventures into unknown territory. Tionga faces the loss of one of his own while Te Purewa waits for the signal of war from Te Rehu o Tainui. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: Whatukura wants justice, Kid chases his dream and Te Ururangi becomes vulnerable. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Sort Of
channel.desc: A big-hearted series about Sabi Mehboob, a fluid millennial who straddles various identities. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: Debbs Murray has trained over 3,000 frontline workers. She is a family violence practitioner with her own powerful story of lived experience. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: We share the personal stories of Sammie and Lydia and their forming of the New Zealand Hague Collective to help women navigate this terrifying international law. (R).
